argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_reval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( Re ` A ) = ( ( A + ( * ` A ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cjth | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( A + ( * ` A ) ) e. RR /\ ( _i x. ( A - ( * ` A ) ) ) e. RR ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simpld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A + ( * ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_rehalfcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( A + ( * ` A ) ) / 2 ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( Re ` A ) e. RR ) |
